document.full_text: dillon gee, pitching in place of chris young, worked into the sixth inning as the mets beat the dodgers and ended andre ethier's hitting streak at 30 games.
document.title: mets 4, dodgers 2: mets stop ethier with a fill-in starter's help
lines_and_colors: dillon gee, pitching in place of chris young, worked into the sixth inning as the mets beat the dodgers and ended andre ethier's hitting streak at 30 games.
